# ENTITY::DOES_ENTITY_EXIST

## Summary
Check that entity exists in the world

## Parameters
* **ENTITY_INDEX** entity

## Returns
* **BOOL**

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Checks whether an entity exists in the game world.
